details.title: CKAN to PoIs - multiple geo-systems
details.description: Tranfer data from CKAN Datasets into Point of Interests (supports Systems "GGRS87" and "WGS84").

preference.name: coordinates_attr
preference.label: Coordinates attribute
preference.description: Name of the columns where the coordinates are stored. If the dataset provides the coordinates through a pair of columns, you can pass those names using a comma (e.g. 'latitude, longitude')

preference.name: marker_url-type
preference.label: Marker Icon URL type
preference.description: Define if the URL pointing to a marker icon is an Absolute URL (type:'absolute_url') or Internal URL Source (type:'internal_url'). Leave empty for default marker icon

preference.name: marker-icon
preference.label: Marker Icon
preference.description: Absolute URL or Internal URL Source pointing to an image that will be used for the markers created by this operator. Default internal folder 'images/' . Leave this setting empty for using the default marker icon

preference.name: coordinate_system
preference.label: Coordinate System
preference.description: The Coordinate System used by the entity data. Leave empty for global system WGS84

outputendpoint.name: poiOutput
outputendpoint.label: Transformed PoIs
outputendpoint.description: Transformed Point of Interest from the received dataset

inputendpoint.name: entityInput
inputendpoint.label: Entity
inputendpoint.description: Received dataset will be transformed into PoIs
